event.title: Latin Boom Party
event.description:
★Japanese below
#latinboom #latin #boom #salsa #ropponngi #djluisjapan #lesson #party

LATIN BOOM IN NEW PLANET

■DATE：Nov 15 FRIDAY
■TIME：19：00 – 23：00
■PLACE：NEW PLANET
https://www.latinochanell.com/

■FEE Plan：
￥2.000 (w/Lesson/party and all yo can drink 4HOURS include)

■TIME SCHEDULE
★19:00 OPEN
★19:30 FREE SALSA LESSON by Ricardo
★20:00 DJ TIME
( SALSA・BACHATA・MERENGUE・REQUEST)
★23:00 CLOSE

WE LOOK FORWARD TO YOUR VISIT !
■□■□■□■□■□■□■■□■□■□■□
NEW PLANET ROPPONGI
Tokyo-to Minato ku, Roppongi, 3-10-5 Marina Bldg １F
1 minutes walk from Roppongi Station Exit 5

※Check here to see other events↓
Hp : http://www.latinochanell.com/

No need for experience of dance and exercise.
BEGINNERS ARE WELCOME

SALSA is a partner dance of men and women with joyful latin rhythm and music.

Let’s make your community extend through salsa & bachata dancing!!
Man ask woman for a dance, and partners are changed every one song.

It is popular in the world, Enjoy social dancing through salsa!!!

◆◆◆　★☆★　◆◆◆　★☆★　◆◆◆　★☆★　◆◆◆

☆Every Month 3rd Friday : LESSON&PARTY**All you can drink**

SALSA & BACHATA at Roppongi New Planet

3-10-5 Roppongi, Minato, Tokyo　１F Marina Bldg.

090-5435-1200 （1 min walk from Roppongi station at exit 5）

初心者大歓迎です
Salsa Dance 踊りたい人の為のレッスン＆パーティイベントを開催！

ダンス経験不問、運動が得意で無い方も大丈夫です。
楽しくサルサダンスを初めてみませんか？

サルサダンスは、ラテンの陽気なリズムと音楽に合わせ、男女ペアで踊ってサルサダンスを通して新たな出会い、コミュニティを広げませんか？世界中でも若者を中心に大人気。

#latinboom #latin #boom #salsa #ropponngi #djluisjapan #lesson #party
